book_title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

characters.name: Harry Potter
characters.description: The Boy Who Lived, brave and loyal Gryffindor student characterized by his courage, determination, and willingness to sacrifice for others.

personality.behavior_summary: Courageous young wizard who values friendship and justice above all else.
personality.motivations: To protect his friends, defeat evil, and discover his identity
personality.character_arc: From orphaned boy to hero who embraces his destiny

characters.name: Hermione Granger
characters.description: Brilliant and hardworking witch, known for her intelligence, loyalty, and fierce dedication to her studies and friends.

personality.behavior_summary: Book-smart witch who uses logic and knowledge to solve problems.
personality.motivations: To prove herself and help her friends succeed
personality.character_arc: From rule-follower to brave rebel for what's right

characters.name: Ron Weasley
characters.description: Loyal and humorous friend from a large wizarding family, known for his bravery, chess skills, and unwavering friendship.

personality.behavior_summary: Comic relief who shows unexpected bravery when it matters most.
personality.motivations: To step out of his brothers' shadows and prove his worth
personality.character_arc: From overshadowed youngest brother to confident hero
